meanings.definition: A flat plate at the base of a structure, especially one that supports a vertical member
meanings.sent1: The baseplate of the tower kept it steady.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the baseplate is securely attached to the bottom of the building.
meanings.sent3: The baseplate decided it wanted to be the foundation of all structures.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the baseplate of her success.
meanings.sent5: The baseplate, like a strong foundation, held everything together.

meanings.definition: The part of a firearm that connects the stock to the barrel
meanings.sent1: He carefully cleaned the baseplate of his rifle.
meanings.sent2: The baseplate of the gun was essential for stability.
meanings.sent3: The baseplate of the rifle joked about being the bridge between stock and barrel.
meanings.sent4: The baseplate, like a bridge, connected the gun's parts.
meanings.sent5: The baseplate, a crucial link, ensured the gun functioned properly.

meanings.definition: A plate used as a foundation for a machine or piece of equipment
meanings.sent1: The mechanic checked the baseplate of the engine.
meanings.sent2: The baseplate of the generator needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The baseplate of the machine decided it was the boss of all plates.
meanings.sent4: The baseplate, like a solid ground, supported the equipment.
meanings.sent5: The baseplate, a sturdy foundation, kept the machine in place.
